attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
No Need for Expensive Drugs to control their thoughts and desires.
They can be "Safely" intergrated back into the community.
Human Rights of Children put first, instead that of Child Molesters.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Castrate Serial Pedophiles."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11873.asp

Prime Minister's Office
